mapper.select: SELECT FACE_YOUNGMALE , FACE_YOUNGFEMALE , FACE_ADULTMALE , FACE_ADULTFEMALE , FACE_MIDDLEMALE , FACE_MIDDLEFEMALE , FACE_SENIORMALE , FACE_SENIORFEMALE FROM "TB_AI_NVR_DASH_BOARD_DAILY_COUNT_SUMMARY" WHERE OCCU_DATE = CONVERT(varchar, GETDATE(), 112)

SELECT ISNULL( SUM(FACE_YOUNGMALE + FACE_YOUNGFEMALE + FACE_ADULTMALE + FACE_ADULTFEMALE + FACE_MIDDLEMALE + FACE_MIDDLEFEMALE + FACE_SENIORMALE + FACE_SENIORFEMALE), 0 ) AS TotalSum FROM TB_AI_NVR_DASH_BOARD_DAILY_COUNT_SUMMARY WHERE OCCU_DATE = CONVERT(varchar, GETDATE(), 112)

SELECT SUM(CNT.VEHICLE_CAR) AS carCount, SUM(CNT.VEHICLE_BUS) AS busCount, SUM(CNT.VEHICLE_TRUCK) AS truckCount, SUM(CNT.VEHICLE_MOTORCYCLE) AS motocycleCount, SUM(CNT.VEHICLE_BICYCLE) AS bicycleCount FROM "TB_AI_NVR_DASH_BOARD_DAILY_COUNT" CNT WHERE SUBSTRING(CNT.OCCU_TIME, 1, 8) = CONVERT(varchar, GETDATE(), 112)

SELECT ISNULL( SUM(CNT.VEHICLE_CAR + CNT.VEHICLE_BUS + CNT.VEHICLE_TRUCK + CNT.VEHICLE_MOTORCYCLE + CNT.VEHICLE_BICYCLE), 0 ) AS TotalSum FROM "TB_AI_NVR_DASH_BOARD_DAILY_COUNT" CNT WHERE SUBSTRING(CNT.OCCU_TIME, 1, 8) = CONVERT(varchar, GETDATE(), 112)

SELECT SUBSTRING(OCCU_TIME, 9, 2) AS time , PERSON , VEHICLE , FACE , LPR , INV_CNT , LOT_CNT , CNT_CNT , FAL_CNT FROM "TB_AI_NVR_DASH_BOARD_DAILY_COUNT" WHERE SUBSTRING(OCCU_TIME, 1, 8) = CONVERT(varchar, GETDATE(), 112) ORDER BY OCCU_TIME

SELECT FACE_NOMASKMALEYOUNG , FACE_NOMASKMALEADULT , FACE_NOMASKMALEMIDDLE , FACE_NOMASKMALESENIOR , FACE_NOMASKFEMALEYOUNG , FACE_NOMASKFEMALEADULT , FACE_NOMASKFEMALEMIDDLE , FACE_NOMASKFEMALESENIOR FROM "TB_AI_NVR_DASH_BOARD_DAILY_COUNT_SUMMARY" WHERE OCCU_DATE = CONVERT(varchar, GETDATE(), 112)

SELECT TOP 10 CNT.CAMERA_NAME , SUM(CNT.PERSON) AS personCount , SUM(CNT.VEHICLE) AS vehicleCount , SUM(CNT.FACE) AS faceCount , SUM(CNT.LPR) AS lprCount , SUM(CNT.INV_CNT) AS invCntCount , SUM(CNT.LOT_CNT) AS lotCntCount , SUM(CNT.CNT_CNT) AS cntCntCount , SUM(CNT.FAL_CNT) AS falCntCont FROM "TB_AI_NVR_DASH_BOARD_DAILY_COUNT" CNT WHERE SUBSTRING(CNT.OCCU_TIME, 1, 8) = CONVERT(varchar, GETDATE(), 112) GROUP BY CNT.CAMERA_NAME ORDER BY SUM(CNT.TOT_CNT)

SELECT TOP 10 CNT.CAMERA_NAME, SUM(CNT.TOT_CNT) AS total_count, SUM(CNT.VEHICLE_CAR) AS carCount, SUM(CNT.VEHICLE_BUS) AS busCount, SUM(CNT.VEHICLE_TRUCK) AS truckCount, SUM(CNT.VEHICLE_MOTORCYCLE) AS motocycleCount, SUM(CNT.VEHICLE_BICYCLE) AS bicycleCount FROM "TB_AI_NVR_DASH_BOARD_DAILY_COUNT" CNT WHERE SUBSTRING(CNT.OCCU_TIME, 1, 8) = CONVERT(varchar, GETDATE(), 112) GROUP BY CNT.CAMERA_NAME ORDER BY SUM(CNT.TOT_CNT) DESC

SELECT SUM(CNT.INV_CNT) AS invCntCount , SUM(CNT.LOT_CNT) AS lotCntCount , SUM(CNT.CNT_CNT) AS cntCntCount , SUM(CNT.FAL_CNT) AS falCntCont FROM "TB_AI_NVR_DASH_BOARD_DAILY_COUNT" CNT WHERE SUBSTRING(CNT.OCCU_TIME, 1, 8) = CONVERT(varchar, GETDATE(), 112)

SELECT FACE_YOUNGMALE , FACE_YOUNGFEMALE , FACE_ADULTMALE , FACE_ADULTFEMALE , FACE_MIDDLEMALE , FACE_MIDDLEFEMALE , FACE_SENIORMALE , FACE_SENIORFEMALE FROM "TB_AI_NVR_DASH_BOARD_DAILY_COUNT_SUMMARY" WHERE OCCU_DATE = #{occuDate}

SELECT SUM(CNT.VEHICLE_CAR) AS carCount, SUM(CNT.VEHICLE_BUS) AS busCount, SUM(CNT.VEHICLE_TRUCK) AS truckCount, SUM(CNT.VEHICLE_MOTORCYCLE) AS motocycleCount, SUM(CNT.VEHICLE_BICYCLE) AS bicycleCount FROM "TB_AI_NVR_DASH_BOARD_DAILY_COUNT" CNT WHERE SUBSTRING(CNT.OCCU_TIME, 1, 8) = #{occuDate}

SELECT ISNULL( SUM(CNT.VEHICLE_CAR + CNT.VEHICLE_BUS + CNT.VEHICLE_TRUCK + CNT.VEHICLE_MOTORCYCLE + CNT.VEHICLE_BICYCLE), 0 ) AS TotalSum FROM "TB_AI_NVR_DASH_BOARD_DAILY_COUNT" CNT WHERE SUBSTRING(CNT.OCCU_TIME, 1, 8) = #{occuDate}

SELECT SUBSTRING(OCCU_TIME, 9, 2) AS time , PERSON , VEHICLE , FACE , LPR , INV_CNT , LOT_CNT , CNT_CNT , FAL_CNT FROM "TB_AI_NVR_DASH_BOARD_DAILY_COUNT" WHERE SUBSTRING(OCCU_TIME, 1, 8) = #{occuDate} ORDER BY OCCU_TIME

SELECT FACE_NOMASKMALEYOUNG , FACE_NOMASKMALEADULT , FACE_NOMASKMALEMIDDLE , FACE_NOMASKMALESENIOR , FACE_NOMASKFEMALEYOUNG , FACE_NOMASKFEMALEADULT , FACE_NOMASKFEMALEMIDDLE , FACE_NOMASKFEMALESENIOR FROM "TB_AI_NVR_DASH_BOARD_DAILY_COUNT_SUMMARY" WHERE OCCU_DATE = #{occuDate}

SELECT TOP 10 CNT.CAMERA_NAME , SUM(CNT.PERSON) AS personCount , SUM(CNT.VEHICLE) AS vehicleCount , SUM(CNT.FACE) AS faceCount , SUM(CNT.LPR) AS lprCount , SUM(CNT.INV_CNT) AS invCntCount , SUM(CNT.LOT_CNT) AS lotCntCount , SUM(CNT.CNT_CNT) AS cntCntCount , SUM(CNT.FAL_CNT) AS falCntCont FROM "TB_AI_NVR_DASH_BOARD_DAILY_COUNT" CNT WHERE SUBSTRING(CNT.OCCU_TIME, 1, 8) = #{occuDate} GROUP BY CNT.CAMERA_NAME ORDER BY SUM(CNT.TOT_CNT)

SELECT TOP 10 CNT.CAMERA_NAME, SUM(CNT.TOT_CNT) AS total_count, SUM(CNT.VEHICLE_CAR) AS carCount, SUM(CNT.VEHICLE_BUS) AS busCount, SUM(CNT.VEHICLE_TRUCK) AS truckCount, SUM(CNT.VEHICLE_MOTORCYCLE) AS motocycleCount, SUM(CNT.VEHICLE_BICYCLE) AS bicycleCount FROM "TB_AI_NVR_DASH_BOARD_DAILY_COUNT" CNT WHERE SUBSTRING(CNT.OCCU_TIME, 1, 8) = #{occuDate} GROUP BY CNT.CAMERA_NAME ORDER BY SUM(CNT.TOT_CNT) DESC
